ARABIC: وَلَا تَقْرَبُوا۟ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةً وَسَآءَ سَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And do not go near to fornication. It is an indecent act, an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And do not go near fornication, as it is immoral and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (viii) Do not even approach fornication for it is an outrageous act, and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not even approach adultery. It is indecent and an evil act.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And do not approach adultery – it is indeed a shameful deed; and a very evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And come not near to unlawful sex. Verily, it is Fahishah (immoral sin) and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And go not nigh to fornication; surely it is an indecency and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And approach not fornication; surely it is an indecency, and evil as a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And come not near unto adultery. Lo! it is an abomination and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not commit adultery, for it is an indecent thing and an evil course.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And approach not adultery; verily it is ever an abomination and vile as a pathway.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do not approach fornication. It is indeed an indecency and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nor come nigh to adultery: for it is a shameful (deed) and an evil, opening the road (to other evils).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And come not near to the unlawful sexual intercourse. Verily, it is a Fahishah [i.e. anything that transgresses its limits (a great sin)], and an evil way (that leads one to Hell unless Allah forgives him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do not draw near to fornication, for it is an indecency, and its way is evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And do not come near adultery. It is immoral, and an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And do not approach unlawful sexual intercourse. Indeed, it is ever an immorality and is evil as a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:32] And do not come [anywhere] near fornication — this [form of expressing it] is more effective than [saying] ‘Do not commit it’. It is indeed an indecency, an abomination, and, it is, an evil way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And come not near unto adultery) secretly or openly. (Lo! it is an abomination) a transgression and sin (and an evil way) to choose.
